      • HEADER_STICKY

        @Deprecated
public static final int HEADER_STICKY
        已过时。 
        This constant has been marked as deprecated to indicate its pending replacement in the next major version. In the future, sticky behaviour will be standard, and there will be an option disable it with a new NONSTICKY constant, however, use of it will force the INLINE display method.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • LayoutParams

        @Deprecated
public LayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams other)
        已过时。 
        This constructor will be removed in version 0.5.

        Use from(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams) instead.

        参数:
        other - Source layout params.

      • LayoutParams

        @Deprecated
public LayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams other)
        已过时。 
        This constructor will be removed in version 0.5.

        Use from(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams) instead as this constructor will not copy the margin params from the source layout.

        参数:
        other - Source layout params.

    • 方法详细资料

      • from

        public static StickyLayoutManager.LayoutParams from(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams other)
        Creates a new instance of StickyLayoutManager.LayoutParams.
        参数:
        other - Source layout params.
        返回:
        New layout params.

      • areHeaderFlagsSet

        public boolean areHeaderFlagsSet(int flags)

      • getFirstPosition

        public int getFirstPosition()
        Get the first position for the section to which this param's item belongs.
        返回:
        A value <= 0.

      • setFirstPosition

        public void setFirstPosition(int firstPosition)
        Set the first position for the section to which this param's item belongs.
        参数:
        firstPosition - First position of section for this param's item. Must be <= 0 or an InvalidFirstPositionException runtime exception will be thrown.

      • getTestedFirstPosition

        public int getTestedFirstPosition()
        Get the first position for the section to which this param's item belongs. Will throw a MissingFirstPositionException runtime exception if the value is < 0.
        返回:
        A value >= 0.

      • isHeaderEndAligned

        public boolean isHeaderEndAligned()

        public boolean isHeaderSticky()

      • setSlm

        public void setSlm(java.lang.String key)
        Set the layout manager for this section to a custom implementation. This custom SLM must be registered via StickyLayoutManager.addSlm(String, SectionLayoutManager).
        参数:
        key - Identifier for a registered custom SLM to layout this section out with.

      • setSlm

        public void setSlm(int id)
        Set the layout manager for this section to one of the default implementations.
        参数:
        id - Kind of SLM to use.
